import React from 'react'; import Thumbnail from '../images/ModelingClay.jpg'; const ItemCard = ({ ItemName, Zone, Location, Cabinet, Box, Activities, Keywords, Notes }) => { return (

{ItemName}

Zone:
{Zone}
Location:
{Location}
Cabinet:
{Cabinet}
Box:
{Box}
Activities:
{Activities}
Keywords:
{Keywords}
Notes:
{Notes}
) } export default ItemCard;
